title: Designing Effective Mathematics Instructional Methods Using MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Middle school mathematics education course for vocational training institutions. Implementation of simulation/VR content via smartphones for project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can complete real-life problem-solving math modeling at least three times using VR simulations in a MOOC environment.
Learners can submit one math project incorporating peer feedback using online collaboration tools.
Learners can pass self-assessment tests with over 80% accuracy using review materials provided on a mobile platform for three months after course completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
